title: Sampler
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in cross stitches on plain weave foundation
description: Within an acorn border, isolated motifs with a town at the bottom dominated by a large yellow tower.  Netherlands lion in a Holland garden, symbol of the United Provinces, at upper right.  Coat of arms of Middelburg at upper left. Unfinished
name: Sampler
